attributes.action: set up a Royal Commission to consider and measure the effects of aircraft noise on the citizens of the country and of aircraft pollution on the environment, with a view to making recommendations for control  over the coming decades.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There has been a massive increase of  flights. There are few part of the country free from the constant roar of planes - an M25 in the air. The pollution effects must be serious. There is a need to balance economic factors with a tolerable living environment. A serious review is urgent.
